Title: Establishes the drinking water quality institute to make recommendations to the department of health relating to ensuring the safety of potable water
Summary: Establishes the drinking water quality institute to make recommendations to the department of health relating to ensuring the safety of potable water.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title 8 ยง269, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the drinking water quality institute and providing for its duties
